message: Paula, it was in reaction to the first comments on the feed. I call it as I see it. It only should offend the culprits doing it. People were complaining and blaming the government rather than doing something about it. The town has many elected officials, which means they can be replaced. My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.
